headerDisplay: Homebridge support for NX-595E ComNav/CaddX network interface (https://github.com/flareman/homebridge-nx595e/)

username.title: Username
username.description: The alarm panel username to be used

pin.title: PIN code
pin.description: The PIN code for the username specified

ip.title: IP address
ip.description: The alarm panel IP address (should be set as static)

useHTTPS.title: Use https:// (SSL)
useHTTPS.description: Use https:// prefix (SSL) instead of standard http:// for communicating with the network module

displayBypassSwitches.title: Display zone bypass switches
displayBypassSwitches.description: Whether zone sensors will also expose a switch for bypassing

pollTimer.title: Poll delay (in ms)
pollTimer.description: Delay in ms between poll requests to the panel for status updates

radarPersistence.title: Radar sensor persistence (in ms)
radarPersistence.description: Time in milliseconds for which a radar will report motion after it fires (between 500 and 300,000 ms)

smokePersistence.title: Smoke sensor persistence (in ms)
smokePersistence.description: Time in milliseconds for which a smoke sensor will report motion after it fires (between 500 and 300,000 ms)

ignoreZones.title: Zones to be ignored
ignoreZones.description: Specifies which zones should be ignored; zone indexes can be separated by commas. Ranges are allowed as well using a dash.

override.title: Zone Overrides

index.title: Zone index
index.description: The index of the specified zone to override (must be valid; when multiple overrides are set for the same zone index, only the last one will be used)

name.title: Zone name
name.description: The override name for this zone (or left blank if you want to retain the original name)

sensor.title: Zone type (Contact, Smoke or Radar)
sensor.description: The type of this zone sensor, namely "Contact" sensor, "Smoke" sensor, or motion "Radar"

override.description: Custom override for zone names and accessory types
